prompts: Show me a weather-themed Pokemon that can change forms based on the season.
Create a Pokemon that embodies the essence of clouds with a gentle personality.
Imagine a water-type Pokemon that can transform into different weather conditions.
Make a cute and fluffy Pokemon that represents the atmosphere and climate.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a cloud with a playful demeanor and soft features.
Design a Pokemon that can adapt its form to reflect various weather types.
Give me a small, amorphous Pokemon that brings rain and sunshine wherever it goes.
